Question Number: 1
Variable Label: Satisfaction with economic conditions
Question Text: at the moment, are you dissatisfied, neither dissatisfied nor satisfied, or satisfied with economic conditions in [country]
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 2
Variable Label: Evaluations of Economic Conditions
Question Text: how do economic conditions in [country] compare to one year ago?  are they:
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 3
Variable Label: Economic Expectations
Question Text: what about in twelve months time?  do you expect economic conditions in [country] to be worse, the same, or better than they are now
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 4
Variable Label: Evaluations of personal economic conditions compared to other Malawians.
Question Text: now let us speak about your personal economic conditions.  would you say they are worse, the same, or better than other [country]ans
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 5A-D
Variable Label: How do you currently obtain food?
Question Text: what about you?  describe how you currently obtain the food you and your family eat each month?  is there anything else
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 19
Variable Label: People more responsible for well-being VS govt. responsibility
Question Text: a.  people should be responsible for their own success and well being.  b.  government should bear the main responsibility for ensuring the success and well-being of people
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 20
Variable Label: Free to earn VS limited income?
Question Text: a.  people should be free to earn as much as they can, even if this leads to differences in income.  b.  government should place limits on how much rich people can earn, even if this discourages some people from working hard
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 21
Variable Label: Start own business VS govt. employment.
Question Text: a. the best way to create jobs is to encourage people to start their own large or small businesses.  b.  the government should help to provide employment for everyone who wants to work
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 22
Variable Label: New business risky VS invest to start business
Question Text: a.  there is no sense in trying to start a new business because it might lose money.  b.  if a person has a good idea for a business, they should invest their own savings or borrow money to try to make it succeed
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Variable Label: Who should take responsibility for schools and clinics?

Question Number: 24
Variable Label: Variety of goods at high prices VS shortages at low prices?
Question Text: a.  it is better to have a wide variety of goods and many goods in the market, even if prices are high.  b.  it is better to have low prices, even if there are shortages of goods
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 25
Variable Label: Free un-raised health care stds VS paid better health care
Question Text: a.  it is better to be able to visit clinics and get medicine for free, even if it means we cannot raise healthcare standards.  b.  it is better to raise healthcare standards, even if we have to pay medical fees
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 26
Variable Label: Keep govt. employees VS retrench govt. employees
Question Text: a.  the number of people who work for government should not be reduced, even if paying their salaries is costly to the country.  b.  the government cannot afford so many public employees and should lay off or retrench some of them
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

Question Number: 27
Variable Label: Govt. own factories VS selling it to private Businesses and individuals
Question Text: a.  the government should retain ownership of its factories, businesses, and farms.  b.  it is better for the government to sell its businesses to private companies and individuals
    Variable Label: ''
    Question Text: ''

[country]ans are equal to one another
